column5: wWell i updated the postthanks to gerritts idea of 50% of the winnings being donated to FISHING FOR TYLER !!!!!! I think thats a great idea,what does everyone think of that???
Can all go as far as I'm concerned...I just want that big honkin trophy as a bow ornament ! LOL
to be fair it was MTP that suggested it to me.  He is a good feller. G.
That was originally Perchers Idea that I suggested to Gerritt.So lets do it.
Yup... giver all to Tyler! HH
I won't be there to participate and win  , but I can still make a donation, right???

For those not going to BOQ this weekend...  We will all get a chance to donate to Tyler 23 Feb 2008 either by attending the meet and greet at Innisfill or by participating in the on-line auctions...  BTW...I would vote for all to Tyler fund if I was attending this weekend...great cause...
